post.html:
Engaging with the speaker community

“I’ve been incredibly fortunate to get to meet and become friends with some of my heroes in the industry as a result of speaking at conferences. That’s probably the biggest benefit for me.” - Joe Mastey

“Speaking establishes your authority in your subject area, and it gives you the chance to genuinely help people learn something new. This teaching aspect is especially important to me.” - Laura Janusek
